articles.title: Earth's message to space 'more ceremonial than anything' - Townsville Bulletin
articles.description:
ANU astrophysicist and cosmologist Dr Brad Tucker says the chances aliens will listen to and decode a radio message to the stars is “slim at best”.  

In 1974, American scientists sent the Arecibo message to space, saying there is life on earth. Now, the mess…

articles.author: Salma Abdelaziz, Lauren Kent and Li-Lian Ahlskog Hou, CNN
articles.title: A Ukrainian-American woman's family were forced to flee to Russia. She smuggled them to Poland - CNN
articles.description: Mila Turchyn walks into a McDonald's parking lot near the Poland-Ukraine border. She is anxious. She doesn't trust the man she is about to meet. He is a smuggler.

articles.author: Catherine Ng Dellosa
articles.title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang North America adds in-game events and celebrity-driven promotional campaign during 515 event - Pocket Gamer
articles.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang North America is currently celebrating its annual 515 event, letting players experience a new rap music video plus its first-ever celebrity-driven promotional campaign. The popular 5v5 MOBA is holding these festivities until May 23rd…

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Airlines celebrate as Florida judge voids US mask mandate for planes, other travel - ABC News
articles.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's travel mask mandate is thrown out, but it continues to advise unvaccinated Americans against travel to Australia due to the COVID-19 situation.
articles.content: The Biden administration will no longer enforce a US mask mandate on public transportation, after a federal judge in Florida ruled that directive was unlawful, overturning a key White House effort to… [+4679 chars]
